publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date 06/03/16, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To discount on on highway work, over paid
Nov. 13. To 1 Bush. Rye + 1 bush of Corn .95/
To apples in five Barrels pr. br. 1.50
To cash 30/ to pay for wood +c.
By cash over cPd. as he says
To seventy seven ft. Pine Boards $15
To 108 lbs. Beef dld by D. S. M. $4 00
To coal dld by Titus some time since
at the rate of fifty Dollars pr year
